description: Name of the asset grouping used to associate related assets for planning, costing, or maintenance workflows.
Row number for this record within the group, primarily used for sorting or deterministic ordering; likely not business‑significant. Confirm with SME.
Sequence position of the asset inside the group for processing, display, or allocation order; meaning may overlap with row number; confirm with SME.
Unique identifier of the specific asset that belongs to the group; links to the asset master record.
Categorical classification of the asset to support filtering, rules, and reporting; often indicates equipment or component type.
Proportion of group‑level cost assigned to this asset, typically expressed as a percentage; may be required to sum to 100% across the group. Confirm rules with SME.
User or system account that created the record for this group‑asset relationship.
Timestamp when the record was created in the source system.
User or system account that last modified the record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the record.
